name: Gravity's Fault (Isaac Camilleri Games)
description: Help bring the alien back to his proper home The Blue Planet after getting stuck on Poyana Planet! But be careful, the red objects are in his way and he is having a hard time finding his way around them. Slide from side to side and be patient for those that move. Not too patient though, since the alien can not survive on the Poyana Planet for too long. Good luck!
